title: BOOKSTORE / COCKATOO
description: From A to Zrieek! Guide to a Well-Behaved Cockatoo. (Helen)

dialogueTree.title: From A to Zrieek! A Guide To a Well-Behaved Cockatoo: "A sulphur-crested cockatoo sits on..."
dialogueTree.text: A sulphur-crested cockatoo sits on the cover, its beak slightly open. It looks as if the bird is calling out the book title: "From A to Zrieek! A Guide To A Well-Behaved Cockatoo."

links.title: From A to Zrieek! A Guide To a Well-Behaved Cockatoo: "Turns out that there are so many di..."
links.text: Turns out that there are so many different cockatoo species, and they all have behavioural problems.

links.title: Composure: "You don't have behavioural problems..."
links.text: You don't have behavioural problems. That's garbage. You're cool.

links.title: You: ""What about this guide to cockatoos..."
links.text: "What about this guide to cockatoos, storekeeper?"

links.title: Plaisance: ""It's a must-have if you own a cock..."
links.text: "It's a must-have if you own a cockatoo. I've heard they're quite capricious."

links.title: You: ""I want to buy the guide to cockato..."
links.text: "I want to buy the guide to cockatoos."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Oh, a nature enthusiast! Good choi..."
links.text: "Oh, a nature enthusiast! Good choice. I *knew* it was a good idea to keep that around..."

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "You've acquired an interactable ite..."
links.text: You've acquired an interactable item. Investigate this item further by going to the INTERACT tab in your INVENTORY.

links.title: Interfacing: "You wait for the storekeeper to be..."
links.text: You wait for the storekeeper to be distracted. When she's not looking, you haul the tome of cockatoos into your pocket.

links.title: Interfacing: "It's quite a challenge, but eventua..."
links.text: It's quite a challenge, but eventually the guide to cockatoos is yours. Splendid effort!

links.title: Interfacing: "Slowly, you move your hand toward t..."
links.text: Slowly, you move your hand toward the tome of cockatoos. Before you reach the book, you're interrupted:

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant coughs sharply, then..."
links.text: The lieutenant coughs sharply, then whispers: "Do we really need to do this? I think not."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Sir, no touching the merchandise...."
links.text: "Sir, no touching the merchandise. People like their books pristine, not handled by god knows who."
